description: An AI agent monitors a semiconductor fabrication process, analyzing sensor data to identify potential yield-reducing anomalies.  The system operates within defined parameters and alerts human operators to issues requiring intervention.
initial_goal: Continuously monitor sensor data from the semiconductor fabrication line and alert operators to anomalies exceeding predefined thresholds. Generate daily reports summarizing process stability and yield.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor manufacturing (specifically, a 300mm wafer fabrication facility)
